definition: to put on a straight, stern or blank face/to put on a poker face
board/plank/plate/shutter/table tennis bat/clappers (music)/CL:塊|块[kuai4]/accented beat in Chinese music/hard/stiff/to stop smiling or look serious

sentences.english: But this only makes matters worse for the country's pouting men.
sentences.chinese: 兩相對照，那些撅嘴板臉的男隊員更是相形見絀。
